user.cred_check: select p.uuid from profiles p where meta(p).id = $1 and p.pwd = $2
user.get_user_using_uuid: select meta(p).id as uuid, p.* from profiles p where meta(p).id = $1

menu.getMenus: select name, submenu, state, icon, label from global_static where app = $1 and type = $2 and active =true and array_contains(user_type, $3)and array_contains(user_role, $4) order by display_order

appointment.get_user_using_mobile: select p.fname, p.lname, p.mobile, p.gender, p.kipenzi from profiles p where p.mobile = $1
